Musk will personally oversee manufacturing efficiency.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tesla-signs-chip-deal-with-samsung-elon-musk-says-samsung-agreed-to-allow-/articleshow/122948320.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tesla-signs-chip-deal-with-samsung-elon-musk-says-samsung-agreed-to-allow-/articleshow/122948320.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 12:48:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40454" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122948307,imgsize-40454.cms"/></item><item><title>Thailand shooting: Gunman attacks crowd in Bangkok market, then kills self; 6 dead</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/thailand-4-killed-after-shooting-at-bangkok-market-probe-underway/articleshow/122947696.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/thailand-4-killed-after-shooting-at-bangkok-market-probe-underway/articleshow/122947696.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 12:22:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="849513" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122947649,imgsize-849513.cms"/></item><item><title>UP shocker: Patients treated in torchlight at Ballia hospital</title><description><![CDATA[A power outage and generator failure plunged Ballia district hospital's emergency room into darkness, forcing medical staff to treat patients under torchlight. The 45-minute blackout occurred on Friday evening, prompting a swift response from health officials. Additional inverters have been installed to prevent future incidents and improve the system's efficiency.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/varanasi/up-shocker-patients-treated-in-torchlight-at-ballia-hospital-medical-building-also-had-technical-problem/articleshow/122947375.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/varanasi/up-shocker-patients-treated-in-torchlight-at-ballia-hospital-medical-building-also-had-technical-problem/articleshow/122947375.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 12:08:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="14732" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122947402,imgsize-14732.cms"/></item><item><title>'What’s with the English?' — Karthik, Vaughan weigh in on handshake drama</title><description><![CDATA[The drawn fourth Test between India and England witnessed heated debate after Ravindra Jadeja and Washington Sundar refused an early draw offer, frustrating England captain Ben Stokes. Dinesh Karthik questioned England's sportsmanship, while Michael Vaughan supported India's decision to allow their batsmen to pursue centuries. With the series at 2-1, the controversy adds fuel to the highly anticipated Oval Test.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-whats-with-the-english-karthik-vaughan-weigh-in-on-stokes-vs-jadeja-washington-handshake-drama/articleshow/122949054.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-whats-with-the-english-karthik-vaughan-weigh-in-on-stokes-vs-jadeja-washington-handshake-drama/articleshow/122949054.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 13:29:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="153864" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122949113,imgsize-153864.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI CEO admits he is ‘scared’ to use AI: ‘I don’t know who is…’</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI CEO Sam Altman expressed concerns about the rapid advancement of AI, admitting his own apprehension about using certain AI tools due to data privacy concerns. He acknowledged the intense competition among AI companies and the potential for AI to reshape society, while also addressing fears about job displacement and the need for adaptation in a future dominated by AI.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-admits-he-is-scared-to-use-ai-i-dont-know-who-is/articleshow/122899310.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-admits-he-is-scared-to-use-ai-i-dont-know-who-is/articleshow/122899310.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 25 Jul 2025 12:47:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19136" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122899307,imgsize-19136.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Don’t resign under pressure….’: TCS layoffs opposed by IT employee unions</title><description><![CDATA[Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) faces objections from IT employee organizations over its plan to reduce staff by approximately 12,000, impacting middle and senior positions. ': Ex-cricketer says Gambhir should take chill pill</title><description><![CDATA[Sanjay Manjrekar suggests Gautam Gambhir needs to relax and be more open to criticism, particularly regarding Shubman Gill's captaincy and team selections. Manjrekar credits the players' resilience for India's draw against England, questioning Gambhir's tactical decisions and dismissing his defense of Gill's form. He also challenged Gambhir's explanation of Karun Nair's exclusion from the team.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-in-this-dressing-room-ex-india-cricketer-says-gautam-gambhir-should-take-a-chill-pill/articleshow/122948017.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-in-this-dressing-room-ex-india-cricketer-says-gautam-gambhir-should-take-a-chill-pill/articleshow/122948017.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 12:36:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="61406" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122948049,imgsize-61406.cms"/></item><item><title>8 years 4 months and 10 days: Yogi Adityanath becomes CM with longest consecutive tenure in UP</title><description><![CDATA[Yogi Adityanath has become Uttar Pradesh's longest-serving Chief Minister, exceeding Govind Ballabh Pant's record. Adityanath, a BJP leader, has been in office for 8 years, 4 months, and 10 days. He initially assumed the role in 2017 after a significant BJP victory, replacing Akhilesh Yadav.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/8-years-4-months-and-10-days-yogi-adityanath-becomes-cm-with-longest-consecutive-tenure-in-up-surpasses-govind-ballabh-pant/articleshow/122948454.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/8-years-4-months-and-10-days-yogi-adityanath-becomes-cm-with-longest-consecutive-tenure-in-up-surpasses-govind-ballabh-pant/articleshow/122948454.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 13:06:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="812553" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122948423,imgsize-812553.cms"/></item><item><title>Jeff Bezos sells $1.5 bn worth of Amazon shares, now holds stock valued at…</title><description><![CDATA[Jeff Bezos recently sold 6.6 million Amazon shares worth $1.5 billion, as per an SEC filing. Bezos intends to sell more shares, potentially up to 25 million by May 2026. He has already sold $4.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/jeff-bezos-sells-1-5-billion-worth-of-amazon-shares-now-holds-stock-valued-at/articleshow/122904177.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/jeff-bezos-sells-1-5-billion-worth-of-amazon-shares-now-holds-stock-valued-at/articleshow/122904177.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 25 Jul 2025 16:34:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="22154" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122904169,imgsize-22154.cms"/></item><item><title>'Joota se maarenge': RJD MLA Bhai Virendra 'threatens' panchayat secretary</title><description><![CDATA[RJD MLA Bhai Virendra is embroiled in controversy following a leaked audio clip where he allegedly threatens a panchayat secretary. This incident has revived long-standing claims of Trump's alleged history of bending the rules on the golf course, sparking divided reactions online.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-president-in-scotland-did-trump-cheat-at-a-golf-game-caddies-video-goes-viral/articleshow/122945495.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-president-in-scotland-did-trump-cheat-at-a-golf-game-caddies-video-goes-viral/articleshow/122945495.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 11:13:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3893902" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122946318,imgsize-3893902.cms"/></item><item><title>India treads cautiously after Trump’s trade agreements with Japan</title><description><![CDATA[India-US trade deal: India is cautiously approaching trade negotiations with the US, observing complications in recent American deals with Japan, Indonesia, and Vietnam. The clinic, operating without a valid license since 2021, deceived a couple who paid Rs 35 lakh, providing them with a baby unrelated to them.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/2-docs-6-others-arrested-for-surrogacy-scam-trafficking-infants/articleshow/122939958.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/2-docs-6-others-arrested-for-surrogacy-scam-trafficking-infants/articleshow/122939958.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:43:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AJAY TOMAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41378" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122943711,imgsize-41378.cms"/></item><item><title>'Dog Babu' gets Patna residence certificate; Yogendra says 'acceptable in Bihar’s SIR'</title><description><![CDATA[Yogendra Yadav criticized the Bihar government after a residence certificate was issued to a dog named 'Dog Babu' in Patna. Yadav highlighted the absurdity, noting that this certificate is being accepted under SIR while genuine Aadhaar and ration cards are being questioned.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/dogs-in-humans-out-dog-babu-gets-patna-residence-certificate-yogendra-yadav-says-this-is-acceptable-in-bihars-sir-but-not-aadhar-card/articleshow/122945451.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/dogs-in-humans-out-dog-babu-gets-patna-residence-certificate-yogendra-yadav-says-this-is-acceptable-in-bihars-sir-but-not-aadhar-card/articleshow/122945451.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 11:32:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="158795" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122946746,imgsize-158795.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | Viral Video: Fan asked to cover Pakistan jersey at Old Trafford</title><description><![CDATA[A video went viral showing a fan in a Pakistan cricket jersey being asked by security at the England-India Test match at Old Trafford to cover it up. Stadium staff cited venue regulations that only apparel supporting participating teams was allowed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-viral-video-fan-asked-to-cover-pakistan-jersey-during-4th-test-at-old-trafford/articleshow/122947666.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-viral-video-fan-asked-to-cover-pakistan-jersey-during-4th-test-at-old-trafford/articleshow/122947666.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 12:28:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="435640" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122947841,imgsize-435640.cms"/></item><item><title>Turkey earthquake: Did Google fail to alert millions?</title><description><![CDATA[Google acknowledged its Android Earthquake Alerts system's failure to issue critical warnings before the devastating 2023 Turkey earthquake, which resulted in over 55,000 deaths. The system underestimated the quake's magnitude, leading to insufficient "Take Action" alerts. This revelation has sparked concerns about over-reliance on Google's alerts and the need for transparent performance assessments.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/turkey-earthquake-did-google-fail-to-alert-millions-here-is-what-the-company-says/articleshow/122944835.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/turkey-earthquake-did-google-fail-to-alert-millions-here-is-what-the-company-says/articleshow/122944835.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 09:58:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="161798" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122944851,imgsize-161798.cms"/></item><item><title>R Ashwin rips into Ben Stokes: 'Your frustration, not our problem!'</title><description><![CDATA[Ravichandran Ashwin defended Ravindra Jadeja and Washington Sundar's decision. They chose to bat on and complete their centuries. This happened after England captain Ben Stokes offered a draw. Ashwin criticized Stokes's offer. He believed India earned the runs. He said centuries should not be gifted. The incident occurred during the fourth Test in Manchester. India and England eventually shook hands.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/r-ashwin-rips-into-ben-stokes-your-frustration-not-our-problem-defends-ravindra-jadeja-washington-sundar-century-push/articleshow/122945613.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/r-ashwin-rips-into-ben-stokes-your-frustration-not-our-problem-defends-ravindra-jadeja-washington-sundar-century-push/articleshow/122945613.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 11:08:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46096" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122946211,imgsize-46096.cms"/></item><item><title>Heartbroken man jumps off 35-ft bridge after wife leaves, survives</title><description><![CDATA[In Gwalior, a 28-year-old man, Mukesh Ahirwar, distraught after his wife left following a quarrel, attempted suicide by jumping from a railway overbridge. He survived the 35-foot fall with minor injuries, thanks to the absence of train movement. After receiving treatment and counseling, he was discharged and handed over to his family for support.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhopal/tujhko-pukare-mera-pyar-heartbroken-hubby-sings-before-jumping-off-35-ft-overbridge-survives/articleshow/122939912.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhopal/tujhko-pukare-mera-pyar-heartbroken-hubby-sings-before-jumping-off-35-ft-overbridge-survives/articleshow/122939912.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:40:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>P NAVEEN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25364" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122943405,imgsize-25364.cms"/></item><item><title>TCS to cut 12,000 jobs: What future tech pros need to thrive</title><description><![CDATA[Tata Consultancy Services plans to reduce its workforce by approximately 12,000 employees, representing 2% of its global staff, as part of a strategic shift towards automation and AI readiness. The incident, captured in a video, highlights concerns about overcrowding and passenger safety in reserved compartments. Indian Railways has responded by requesting details and escalating the issue to the Katihar division.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ac-coach-or-general-compartment-overcrowded-train-in-katihar-leaves-passengers-fuming-watch/articleshow/122944519.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ac-coach-or-general-compartment-overcrowded-train-in-katihar-leaves-passengers-fuming-watch/articleshow/122944519.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 10:12:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39692" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122945129,imgsize-39692.cms"/></item><item><title>Fact check: Did Stokes refuse to shake hands with Jadeja? The series remains 2-1 in England's favor, setting the stage for a high-stakes final Test at The Oval.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/fact-check-did-ben-stokes-refuse-to-shake-hands-with-ravindra-jadeja-watch-video/articleshow/122946062.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/fact-check-did-ben-stokes-refuse-to-shake-hands-with-ravindra-jadeja-watch-video/articleshow/122946062.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 11:33:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="152908" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122946611,imgsize-152908.cms"/></item><item><title>Gold price prediction: What's gold rate outlook for July 28 - should you buy or sell?</title><description><![CDATA[Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are expected to trade sideways due to diminished safe-haven demand as the US secures trade deals. The revision may extend nationwide.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-to-take-up-sir-today-35-lakh-voters-untraceable-opposition-mounts-pressure-on-govt-controversy-explained-in-10-points/articleshow/122943807.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-to-take-up-sir-today-35-lakh-voters-untraceable-opposition-mounts-pressure-on-govt-controversy-explained-in-10-points/articleshow/122943807.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 09:11:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1707405" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122943926,imgsize-1707405.cms"/></item><item><title>'Just fight ...': Washington reveals Gambhir's stirring final-day message</title><description><![CDATA[All-rounder Washington Sundar's maiden Test century spurred India to a draw against England at Old Trafford. India, initially struggling, recovered to 425/4, keeping the series alive at 2-1.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-4th-test-just-fight-washington-sundar-reveals-gautam-gambhirs-stirring-final-day-message/articleshow/122944974.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-4th-test-just-fight-washington-sundar-reveals-gautam-gambhirs-stirring-final-day-message/articleshow/122944974.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 10:05:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="110662" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122945009,imgsize-110662.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Never had failed intelligence system’: Cong uses Chola reference to attack PM</title><description><![CDATA[Congress MP Manickam Tagore criticized Prime Minister Modi's Chola tribute, alleging intelligence failures and comparing Modi's foreign policy unfavorably to the Chola empire's. Despite England's imposing 669, India's fightback, highlighted by Gill's century and Rahul's 90, ensured a draw.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-handshake-denied-washington-sundar-cold-shoulders-harry-brook-video-goes-viral-watch/articleshow/122943887.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-handshake-denied-washington-sundar-cold-shoulders-harry-brook-video-goes-viral-watch/articleshow/122943887.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 09:03:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60218" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122944096,imgsize-60218.cms"/></item><item><title>Twin meteor showers to light up July 29–30 skies with 25 shooting stars an hour</title><description><![CDATA[Get ready for a celestial treat. The Southern Hemisphere will have the best view. A moonless sky will ensure great visibility. Do not miss this natural light show.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/twin-meteor-showers-to-light-up-july-2930-skies-with-25-shooting-stars-an-hour-heres-what-you-need-to-know/articleshow/122944558.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/twin-meteor-showers-to-light-up-july-2930-skies-with-25-shooting-stars-an-hour-heres-what-you-need-to-know/articleshow/122944558.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 09:59:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="6388" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122944928,imgsize-6388.cms"/></item><item><title>'Messi! Chidambaram speculated the government might be concealing tactical errors and losses.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/why-do-you-assume-that-they-came-from-pakistan-chidambarams-remark-on-pahalgam-attackers-stirs-row-bjp-hits-back/articleshow/122943979.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/why-do-you-assume-that-they-came-from-pakistan-chidambarams-remark-on-pahalgam-attackers-stirs-row-bjp-hits-back/articleshow/122943979.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 09:24:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1075326" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122944176,imgsize-1075326.cms"/></item><item><title>Police constable’s wife dies by suicide in UP, alleges harassment by in-laws</title><description><![CDATA[Saumya Kashyap, the wife of a Uttar Pradesh police constable, tragically died by suicide, leaving behind an Instagram video accusing her in-laws of severe harassment. Authorities were alerted after the video surfaced, and an investigation is underway following the notification of Saumya's family.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/police-constables-wife-dies-by-suicide-in-up-alleges-harassment-by-in-laws-in-instagram-video/articleshow/122942853.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/police-constables-wife-dies-by-suicide-in-up-alleges-harassment-by-in-laws-in-instagram-video/articleshow/122942853.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 06:57:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="27320" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122942862,imgsize-27320.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | The final-hour handshake drama at Old Trafford</title><description><![CDATA[Ravindra Jadeja, Washington Sundar, and Shubman Gill's centuries powered India to a morale-boosting draw in the fourth Test against England. The match concluded with handshakes and reflections on valuable learnings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/a-timeline-ravindra-jadeja-washington-sundar-and-the-final-hour-handshake-drama-at-old-trafford/articleshow/122943634.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/a-timeline-ravindra-jadeja-washington-sundar-and-the-final-hour-handshake-drama-at-old-trafford/articleshow/122943634.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 08:20:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="53222" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122943630,imgsize-53222.cms"/></item><item><title>ISI-backed arms, drug racket busted: Consignment linked to Bhagwanpuria aide; 5 held</title><description><![CDATA[Punjab Police, working with central agencies, dismantled an ISI-backed trans-border smuggling ring, arresting five operatives. Authorities are investigating the cause, suspecting faulty wiring or leakage.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/devotees-electrocuted-outside-awshaneshwar-temple-in-barabanki-several-injured-police-inquiry/articleshow/122941750.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/devotees-electrocuted-outside-awshaneshwar-temple-in-barabanki-several-injured-police-inquiry/articleshow/122941750.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 05:08:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PATHIKRIT CHAKRABORTY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1055354" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122941764,imgsize-1055354.cms"/></item><item><title>Cash-at-home controversy: Judge Varma hides identity, is ‘XXX’ in his SC petition - details</title><description><![CDATA[Justice Yashwant Varma, facing a Parliament removal motion over cash found at his residence, has anonymously petitioned the Supreme Court to quash the inquiry report and the former CJI's recommendation for his removal.       <description><![CDATA[KFin Technologies is holding firm on its FY26 revenue growth guidance of 18–20% despite a weak Q1, with CEO Sreekanth Nadella pointing to seasonal trends and upcoming integration of Ascent Fund Services as key tailwinds. “Q2, Q3, and Q4 are typically much stronger,” he said, adding that yield compression in mutual funds is a strategic trade-off to support client growth.       <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week.       <description><![CDATA[IREDA will remain exclusively focused on the renewable energy sector, with no plans to diversify, CMD Pradip Kumar Das told CNBC-TV18.       <title><![CDATA[India-UK free trade agreement likely to be signed next week]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/india-uk-fta-agreement-tariffs-duties-exports-imports-19639560.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The India-UK Free Trade Agreement is expected to be signed next week, pending final legal checks and government approvals. The pact aims to double bilateral trade to $120 billion by 2030 and includes major duty cuts on both sides, with near-complete tariff-free access for Indian exports and significant tariff reductions on UK goods.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Shoppers Stop expects to turn profitable in FY26, driven by improving operational efficiency and a growing share of premium products, said MD & CEO Kavindra Mishra. “The premium product contribution right now is around 67%.
